title: Adobe Stock begins selling AI-generated artwork
description: AI-wielding artist must assert ownership and label each piece as "Generative AI."

title: Apple announces sweeping changes to App Store pricing
description: Changes may help devs handle inflation, exchange rates, and new content types.

title: Apple’s Self Service Repair program launches in Europe
description: The countries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Poland, Spain, Sweden, and the UK.

title: Android Automotive is getting its 38th app: Waze
description: For now it's only in Europe, with a worldwide rollout coming in 2023.

title: Meta needs explicit user consent to run personalized ads, EU watchdog rules
description: Meta may have to rethink its ad model (again) in the next month.

title: New Winamp update adds features, fixes, and (sigh) support for “music NFTs”
description: "Please do not post any rants about NFTs in this thread."

title: Someone paid $95,000 for this pair of jeans recovered from 1857 shipwreck
description: Work pants were recovered from wreck of the SS Central America, which sank in 1857.

title: Amazon offering a whopping $2/month to let it stalk your phone
description: Privacy concerns shuttered similar data collection schemes from Google, Facebook.

title: In win for EU, Amazon will settle high-profile antitrust probes
description: Ecommerce group commits to increasing visibility of rivals’ products.

title: Stalkers’ “chilling” use of AirTags spurs class-action suit against Apple
description: Class action covers anyone in the US who owns iOS or Android devices.

title: Pixel 7 update adds AI-powered noise reduction to incoming phone calls
description: There are 200+ security and bug fixes, Google recorder improvements, and more.

title: Neuralink faces federal probe over alleged animal abuse, “hack job” surgeries
description: Current and former employees blame mishaps and abuse on pressure from Musk to go faster.

title: Paying for a power boost in an EV—good idea or worst idea?
description: Polestar and Mercedes show different approaches to over-the-air power upgrades.

title: Elden Ring opens up its colosseums to multiplayer brawls in free DLC
description: The free download, out Dec. 7, takes new PvP modes into battle-ready arenas.

title: After lunar flyby, NASA’s Orion spacecraft is set to splash down on Sunday
description: NASA is now three weeks into a 25.5-day test flight of the Orion spacecraft.

title: Meta told to overhaul moderation system for high-profile users like Donald Trump
description: Facebook accused of leaving dangerous content online to serve business interests.

title: Elizabeth Holmes appeals conviction, 11-year sentence despite bleak outlook
description: Holmes is currently scheduled to report to prison in April.
